item.description:
Let's meet again at the Clear Conscience Café!

The Clear Conscience Café offers a great coffee selection plus vegetarian organic pannini , and other organic paninni made of turkey, chicken,  peanut butter, banana, and honey 

Last time we were able to sit around in the front with the opportunity to meet everyone and engage in different conversations.
item.how_to_find_us: IÂ´ll be on the front area where we can sit and relax

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Monthly Conversations between native and non-native English speakers
